text: It's hereabouts that the budge takes to the bottle, but I don't think it was through boredom. The film is funny enough in places and has a line or two of painful home truths thrown in. "I don't want to talk like an adult," screams Gina, walking out on the man who has so far failed to make an honest woman of her.
